Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct dial phone, Safe, Cafe, Balcony, WC. Bgls with Direct dial phone, TV, Fridge. Children's pool, 2 tennis courts, Boutique, Jeweler's shop, Volley ball, Mini golf. Conference room capacity: 250 persons.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Beach -300m, Port -75km, Elounda -5km. Nearest airport: Airport -75km.
